## AbstractPostEffect.getIntermediateFramebuffer() method

Gets the intermediate frame buffer by name

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected getIntermediateFramebuffer(name: string, format: TextureFormat, width: number, height: number): FrameBuffer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the intermediate frame buffer |
|  format | [TextureFormat](doc/markdown/./device.textureformat.md) |  |
|  width | number | Width of the frame buffer |
|  height | number | Height of the frame buffer |

**Returns:**

[FrameBuffer](doc/markdown/./device.framebuffer.md)

The intermediate frame buffer or null if not exists

## Remarks

The intemediate buffer will be resized to fit the given size if needed
